name: Shahriar Haque
comment: This is a good product. It is bright enough in the sun. You can buy it!

name: Tanjelus Saad Jim
comment: Sometimes it restarts automaticaly. Other features are just fine.

comment: Very long lasting watch with reasonalbe price. Unfortunately i got some scatch on the display.

comment: Looks good but heavy. It has many uniqe features like stop watch, timer, alarm!

comment: The display is broken. I don't recommend to buy this. Dont waste yore money!

name: Abdullah Shams
comment: This watch is amazing! It is waterproofed too!
